MaqueenColors: Well known colors for a NeoPixel strip
maqueen.fromHSL: Converts a hue saturation luminosity value into a RGB color
maqueen.fromRGB: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
maqueen.fromRGB|param|blue: value of the blue channel [0-255] eg: 255
maqueen.fromRGB|param|green: value of the green channel [0-255] eg: 255
maqueen.fromRGB|param|red: value of the red channel [0-255] eg: 255
maqueen.showColor: Shows all LEDs to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
